titles.title: A resolution designating April 30, 2003, as "Dia de los Ninos: Celebrating Young Americans", and for other purposes.
A resolution designating April 30, 2003, as "Dia de los Ninos: Celebrating Young Americans", and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.
Committee on the Judiciary. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.
Committee on the Judiciary. Reported by Senator Hatch without amendment and with a preamble. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 75.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced in the Senate on April 9, 2003. The summary of that version is repeated here.)Designates April 30, 2003, as Dia de los Ninos: Celebrating Young Americans.
